titleStmt.title: The tryals of Henry Cornish, Esq for conspiring the death of the King, and raising rebellion in this kingdom : and John Fernley, William Ring, and Elizabeth Gaunt for harbouring and maintaining rebels, at the Sessions-house in the Old-Bailey, London and County of Middlesex, on Monday, Octob. 19, 1685.
titleStmt.author: Cornish, Henry, d. 1685.
Fernley, John, d. 1685.
Ring, William, d. 1685.
Gaunt, Elizabeth, d. 1685.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed and sold by George Croom,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of originals in the Huntington Library and the British Library.
